thread.title: RT
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by RT

author: RT
title: RT
text: I walked into the store just to look around. I'm closing on my house in several days and I wanted to get a ballpark estimate on what I would spend on new furniture. I was greeted by a very enthusiastic salesman who listened to my concerns, and literally 20 minutes later I had a house full of furniture. It was a quick and Easy experience and I have already recommended Home Zone to my friends and family
